Class Pet

java.lang.Object
Pet
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Pet extends Object implements Serializable
The Pet class represents a virtual pet with various attributes such as health, happiness, hunger, and sleep. It provides methods to manage the pet's state, update its stats, and handle emotions. Features: - Tracks the pet's stats (health, happiness, hunger, sleep). - Manages state transitions (e.g., default, hungry, angry, sleep). - Handles emotions and their durations. - Supports serialization for saving and loading pet data.
See Also:

    • Pet

      public Pet(String type)
      Constructs a Pet object with the specified type. Initializes the pet's stats based on its type.
      Parameters:
      type - The type of the pet (e.g., "Debatchi", "Tsuyopitchi").

    • Pet

      public Pet(String name, String type, int health, int happiness, int sleep, int hunger, String imagePath)
      Constructs a Pet object with custom stats.
      Parameters:
      state - The initial state of the pet.
      health - The initial health of the pet.
      happiness - The initial happiness of the pet.
      hunger - The initial hunger of the pet.
      sleep - The initial sleep of the pet.
      maxHealth - The maximum health of the pet.
      maxHappiness - The maximum happiness of the pet.
      maxHunger - The maximum hunger of the pet.
      maxSleep - The maximum sleep of the pet. public Pet(String state, double health, double happiness, double hunger, double sleep, double maxHealth, double maxHappiness, double maxHunger, double maxSleep) { this.state = state; this.health = health; this.happiness = happiness; this.hunger = hunger; this.sleep = sleep; this.maxHealth = maxHealth; this.maxHappiness = maxHappiness; this.maxHunger = maxHunger; this.maxSleep = maxSleep; } /** Constructs a Pet object with a name, type, stats, and an image path.
      name - The name of the pet.
      type - The type of the pet.
      health - The initial health of the pet.
      happiness - The initial happiness of the pet.
      sleep - The initial sleep of the pet.
      hunger - The initial hunger of the pet.
      imagePath - The file path to the pet's image.

    • updateRates

      public void updateRates(int specification)
      Updates the rates for sleep, health, happiness, and hunger based on the specified mode.
      Parameters:
      specification - The mode to update rates (0: stop, 1: sleep, 2: hungry, 3: default).
